name: Deserts Peril (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
Twice per Duel, you can apply the following Skill:
● Flip all monsters you control face-down and shuffle them in your Main Monster Zone, then you can change the battle position of 1 monster you control. This Skill can only be used once per turn.
